name: Magician's Headband
description:
Magician's Headband is a puzzle game about a magician and their trusty headband.

This game was made for Thinky Puzzle Game Jam 2. The theme was "Magician's Hat".

Controls:

arrows, WASD - Move
Z - Undo
R - Restart
Esc - Menu
space, X - Select (only in menu)
M - Mute

This game was made using Pancelor's level select fork for PuzzleScript.

Play at puzzlescript.net: [https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=181b46ac773668b4bc08d586509efad8]
